GeneDef.label: slow mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have issues making their mechs work faster, resulting in mech speed boosts having half impact.\n\nThis only takes effect if the mechanitor is under the effects of something that adds speed, like a precept or an implant. This is technically free met if you plan on never using something that would enhance mech work speeds.

GeneDef.label: fast mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have improved mech work speed, at the cost of their own ability to work quickly.

GeneDef.label: extremely fast mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extremely improved mech work speed, at the cost of their own ability to work quickly.
